::Prowl::

Prowl raises an eyebrow plate as he watches the bots take off. -
Strange pair,- he thinks more to himself than to Iron Raptor. Prowl 
turns his head to look at Iron Raptor as he tightens his grip around 
her and powers up his boosters.

The Maximal leans forward to kiss his love while his boosters lift 
them off the ground. -Do you want to fly there fast, love? I can 
probably make it in a very short time.-




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> * Snow Tech grinned and saluted her.*
> 
> " Yes ma'am, sir, ma'am!"
> 
> * He then turned to Shadow Cat and began to march off into the 
bush, intent 
> on getting to the base. Shadow cat rolled her eyes and sighed*
> 
> " He always manages to make some stupid remark out of anything and 
> everything!"
> 
> * She runs ahead of him barring his way*
> 
> " You stupid ass! it would take too long to walk! Get your ass back 
there so 
> i can air lift your fat ass to our new home!"
> 
> * He saluted her and spun on his heel, facing the way he came and 
marched 
> back to his original position, facing Iron Raptor. He looked at her 
with 
> twinkeling eyes and spread his arms so Shadow Cat could lift him. 
Shadow Cat 
> graspe dunder his arms and spread her wings, lifting her and Snow 
Tech off 
> the ground about nine feet. She spoke to Iron Raptor before she 
took off 
> totally.*
> 
> " We will meet you there, i'm sure that we can come up with some 
thing to at 
> least tip the odds to our side."
> 
> * And with that spooken, she lifted herself and the white bot off 
into the 
> sky, but not before Snow Techs smart assed remark came down to the 
other 
> twos ears.*
> 
> " This is little kitties airlines, we are ready for take off, over. 
Yes, you 
> are cleared for take off little kitty. Thank-you mission control, 
rodger 
> that. Vrooom!!! Last one there is a over-sized scrap heap!"
> 
> * His giggling annoyed Shadow Cat and she was tempted to threaten 
him with 
> bodily harm , but knew that would give him the satisfaction of 
getting her 
> goat, so she kept her mouth shut and steered off to the left 
sharply so he 
> squealed like a little girl. She smiled and headed to the base at 
full 
> speed.*
> 
>
